name: F-Colony
description:
Made in 48 for Miz Jam 1

READ THE INSTRUCTIONS OR YOU WILL BE LOST

You are sent by the king to start a new colony. Multitask to grow your colony and gain the kings favor.

Credits

Obviously the art assets aren't my own: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Sound effects from:  https://www.gamemasteraudio.com/

Font from: https://www.1001freefonts.com/

Tools Used:

Aseprite: https://www.aseprite.org/(only for cropping and merging)

Waveform free: https://www.tracktion.com/products/waveform-free

Unity: https://unity.com/
